serverErrors.heading: The following {count, plural, =1 {error} other {errors}} occurred while attempting to process your request.

unknown.unexpected: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

system.unhandledException: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

serverErrors.unhandledException: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

changePassword.InvalidParameterException: The entered password is not valid. Please make sure it meets all requirements and try again.
changePassword.InvalidPasswordException: The entered password is not valid. Please make sure it meets all requirements and try again.
changePassword.LimitExceededException: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Please try again in a little while.
changePassword.TooManyRequestsException: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Please try again in a little while.
changePassword.TooManyFailedAttemptsException: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in a little while.

serverErrors.undefined: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

serverErrors.TooManyFailedAttemptsException: Too many failed attempts. Please try again in a little while.
serverErrors.InvalidParameterException: The entered password is not valid. Please make sure it meets all requirements and try again.
serverErrors.InvalidPasswordException: The entered password is not valid. Please make sure it meets all requirements and try again.
serverErrors.CodeMismatchException: The provided code is not valid.
serverErrors.UserNotFoundException: The provided user could not be found.
serverErrors.UserNotConfirmedException: The provided user is not confirmed.
serverErrors.emailAlreadyInUse: Email already in use, please enter a different email and try again.

cognito.InvalidPasswordException: The entered password is not valid. Please make sure it meets all requirements and try again.
cognito.CodeMismatchException: The provided verification code is invalid or expired.
cognito.ExpiredCodeException: The provided verification code is expired.

validations.inclusion: {description} is not included in the list
validations.wrongDateFormat: {description} must be in the format of {format}
validations.wrongLength: {description} is the wrong length (should be {is} characters)
validations.greaterThanOrEqualTo: {description} must be greater than or equal to {gte}
validations.lessThanOrEqualTo: {description} must be less than or equal to {lte}
validations.email: {description} must be a valid email address
validations.phone: {description} must be a valid phone number
validations.urlFormat: {description} must start with http:// or https://
